That's never a the trade should be there and it should be solid, it shouldn't be sort of, it shouldn't be kind of ifs and buts about it, doubts about it, I mean now you've seen this, the clips up into here and then you'll see everyone get paying up on the short side. But yeah guys, that's just kind of something that I wanted to share with you. Not to say that you should be fading every move because technically both these trades in my opinion made sense, they made logical sense, there was a clear idea, there was clear purpose behind them and I understood my risk in all these trades, but just just to be more aware you know I mean like I was very slow to start scanning out of this trade in here on the right, I was very slow to scale out between sort of 7s and 4s, 8s, just this whole area, it just didn't, there was no initiative below these prices, it kind of was a telltale sign and similar to here over on this side between these and the 7s and 9s sort of thing, that same kind of just reload and then once it moves away from there, and you saw it over here, once it moves away and it goes bid, you have to pay up sort of thing. It's a very painful trade if you want to kind of like... to take a downtick sort of thing. It doesn't work like that. It's just because of the nature of it, anyone who is, like everyone who's accumulated positions down here, you may have not accumulated positions from up here, but everyone who's accumulated positions down here are paying up at these prices up here, 93s, 94s, same in here, you know, paying up at 12s and 13s. It's just understanding, you know, where it's your out, where is your right. So if Plan A doesn't work, how can Plan B be, you know... salvaging plan A, you know, I mean in terms of the risk of plan A, you know, you can't turn this trade into a good trade sort of thing in terms of this is a wrong trade to be positioned in But yeah guys, I mean it's slightly different from what I normally do I just thought that might be useful just at the moment for anyone who's kind of struggling or trying to execute similarly to me and how we can be more aware what's going on
